Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimization with linear objective and linear constraints

Name: Mixed-Integer Linear Programming
Description: Combines LP and IP: some variables integer

Name: Convex Optimization
Description: Objective and constraints form a convex set; global optimum guaranteed

Name: Mixed-Integer Nonlinear Programming
Description: Nonlinear objective/constraints with integer and continuous variables

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Optimization over stages; uses recursive structure

Name: Robust Optimization
Solvability: Tractable if uncertainty set is simple

Name: Multi-Objective Optimization
Solvability: No single solution; use Pareto front

Name: Combinatorial Optimization
Description: Variables are discrete; seeks best object from finite set

Name: Global Optimization
Description: Seeks global optimum in presence of many local optima

Name: Optimal Control
Description: Optimize trajectories of dynamical systems over time
